nodes.text: Mier-Lang was a weapons manufacturer that specialized in demolitions.
Mier-Lang products were available during and after the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconsituted Sith Empire.

Mier-Lang is identified as the manufacturer of several items in Star Wars: The Old Republic. Due to game mechanics, items change their manufacturer based on their individual stats, which can vary. Because of this, it is impossible to identify any specific Mier-Lang products.
